title: Snowpeak Ruins Box Puzzle Walkthrough
description: Complete guide for The Legend of Zelda: Twilight Princess

steps.title: Enter the Room
steps.description: Enter through the door directly in front of the yeti. You'll see several boxes and floor buttons in this puzzle room.

steps.title: Move First Box
steps.description: Push the box to the left of the floor button toward the right. This will begin positioning the boxes for the puzzle.

steps.title: Move Second Box
steps.description: Push the second box in the right corner to the left (which will hit the block of ice). This creates space for the next moves.

steps.title: Position Box 2
steps.description: Push Box 2 towards the floor button. You're getting closer to activating the first button.

steps.title: Align the Boxes
steps.description: Push Box 2 towards Box 1 so that they are up against each other. They need to be aligned for the next step.

steps.title: Activate First Button
steps.description: Push Box 2 onto the button. Success! The first floor button is now activated.

steps.title: Break Ice on Floor Button
steps.description: Use the Ball and Chain to break the ice on the second floor button. Aim carefully and swing!

steps.title: Free Third Box
steps.description: Break the ice on the third box in the bottom left hand corner using the Ball and Chain. Now you can move this box.

steps.title: Move Box 3
steps.description: Push Box 3 toward the other boxes from Part 1. You're bringing all three boxes together now.

steps.title: Push Box 2
steps.description: Push Box 2 across so it is away from both boxes.

steps.title: Move Box 3
steps.description: Push Box 3 towards Box 2 so that they are now touching.

steps.title: Reposition Box 1
steps.description: Push Box 1 to where Box 3 was in the corner by the doors. You're swapping their positions.

steps.title: Move Box 1 to Starting Point
steps.description: Push Box 1 to where Box 3 originally started. This continues the repositioning sequence.

steps.title: Push Box 3 Right
steps.description: Push Box 3 to the right, moving it into position for the final moves.

steps.title: Align Box 3 with Box 2
steps.description: Push Box 3 towards Box 2. They should now be touching and properly aligned.

steps.title: Final Move - Victory!
steps.description: Push Box 2 towards Box 1. This is the final move!
steps.congratulations: Congratulations! You've successfully completed the Snowpeak Ruins box puzzle. Head upstairs to continue your adventure!
